text: Did you trip on your way over? Cara Delevingne has ladders in her hold - ups as she attends Rihanna's fashion launch As a world - famous fashion model, clothes aren't in short supply for Cara Delevingne. But it seems fresh tights are as the British runway star arrived to Rihanna's autumn / winter collection launch in hold ups with more than a few ladders in them. Rocking a few items from the Bajan singers latest River Island range, at least the ripped legwear went well with Cara's grungy urban look.
